name: Mafia Driver - Revenge
description:
Mafia Driver – Revenge, a brand new game of the Mafia Driver sequel, is finally here! Get ready for adventurous missions assigned to you. Do not let the Police get to you! If they do, show them who the boss is.
Prove yourself by using your driving skills. Take down & rob vehicles. Escape from intense helicopter chases.
What's more! Drive as far as you can and escape from the Police in Survival Mode; There is no end if you drive well enough. You can also progress in gangster career with the Challenge Mode.

Bored of parking, racing and fighting? Had enough of tweaking, modifying you ride and monotonous races? Other car games too intense? A perfect blend of crime, street and role-playing. This is the game for you! Drive the car and experience the fun! Shoot your way through the traffic and feel the blur. Beat the heat from the cops and burnout the nitro for a quick escape. Don’t want to do missions? Drive endlessly and collect maximum coins on the road in Survival Mode.

The game is also famous among other genres such as highway games and simulator games.

Fight for your status quo in the mob and become the godfather of mafia world. As you progress in career, you become the most wanted person. At the same time, stay clear of rival mobsters and keep the cops at a distance.

Download today to stem a fast and adventurous revenge drive on your device and reveal the mystery!
Watch our game trailer on YouTube and like us on Facebook. Also, please Tweet if you like it!
Please have a look at our others games as well and have fun!!
